name: Taeguk
flavorText: "Given enough resources, one is possessed of an absolute and infinite potentiality." -High Priest Baek
flavorTextHtml: "Given enough resources, one is possessed of an absolute and infinite potentiality." -High Priest Baek

secondary.textHtml: Gain 2.00% increased damage for 1.5 seconds when you spend resource on a channeled skill. This effect stacks up to 10 times. 2.00%
